title: Why was Roland Bartezko dishonorably discharged from the German Bundeswehr? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bartezko served in the German Army until 1992. During the Balkan wars he fought for Croatian Defence Council and the Kosovo Liberation Army. He later was tried for terrorist acts and sentenced. The German Army terminated him dishonorably for damaging the honor of the German Forces, a violation of the law governing the service of German soldiers.
I have not idea who the guy is let alone why he was discharged from the German military.
